metadata.title: CVE-2024-47759 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free Asset and IT management software package. An technician canupload a SVG containing a malicious script. The script will then beexecuted when any user will try to see the document contents. Upgrade to10.0.17.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
